channel.title: I download the client but its the written form on Microsoft Windows
channel.description:
I download the client from the place (www.mega... blah blah...) and I save it to the desktop, but it opens it up as a Word Document... Have I done something wrong?! :confused: :eek: Could somebody please help me... Cause I'm really stuck and I really WANT to PLAY this in its full extent with the client becaue already it rocks!!
Thanks [u][b]HEAPS!![/b][/u] Mynameisfrank... A.K.A -- Lolfornubz --

item.title: I download the client but its the written form on Microsoft Windows
item.dc:creator: @mynameisfrank mynameisfrank
item.description:
@mynameisfrank wrote:

Tuxedodude:

Try saving it in files. If it doesn’t work try downloading it again. It doesn’t wrok then it’s hopeless.

Could i use the silab client?

Read full topic
